attributes.action: prosecute every mp who comitted fraud with the expenses scandal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i  and the rest of the country want to see all the mp's who comitted fraud and stole money from the expenses scandal jailed for their wrongdoing.
then perhaps the PM can see why the electorate are unhappy with his goverment.

rejection.details: The Government does not prosecute people.  That is a matter for the police and Crown Prosecution Service.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
